category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_dynamiccrosshighlight_available
preference.preference_description: Enable the Dynamic Cross Highlight in the save process. Possible values: - TRUE = "Dynamic Cross Highlight" option is available - FALSE = The CATIA session is locked during the save process and the dynamic cross highlight is not supported.
